member.name: T:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader

summary.vsli:raw: The HTTP headers that may be specified in a client request.

member.summary: 用戶端要求中可能指定的 HTTP 標頭。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Accept

summary.vsli:raw: The Accept header, which specifies the MIME types that are acceptable for the response.

member.summary: Accept 標頭，指定回應可接受的 MIME 類型。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.AcceptCharset

summary.vsli:raw: The Accept-Charset header, which specifies the character sets that are acceptable for the response.

member.summary: Accept-Charset 標頭，指定回應可接受的字元集。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.AcceptEncoding

summary.vsli:raw: The Accept-Encoding header, which specifies the content encodings that are acceptable for the response.

member.summary: Accept-Encoding 標頭，指定回應可接受的內容編碼方式。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.AcceptLanguage

summary.vsli:raw: The Accept-Language header, which specifies that natural languages that are preferred for the response.

member.summary: Accept-Language 標頭，其指定回應慣用的自然語言。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Allow

summary.vsli:raw: The Allow header, which specifies the set of HTTP methods supported.

member.summary: Allow 標頭，指定支援的 HTTP 方法集合。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Authorization

summary.vsli:raw: The Authorization header, which specifies the credentials that the client presents in order to authenticate itself to the server.

member.summary: Authorization 標頭，指定用戶端出示的認證，以便向伺服器驗證自己。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.CacheControl

summary.vsli:raw: The Cache-Control header, which specifies directives that must be obeyed by all cache control mechanisms along the request/response chain.

member.summary: Cache-Control 標頭，指定在要求/回應鏈結中，所有快取控制機制都必須遵守的指示詞。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Connection

summary.vsli:raw: The Connection header, which specifies options that are desired for a particular connection.

member.summary: Connection 標頭，指定用於特定連線的理想選項。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.ContentEncoding

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Encoding header, which specifies the encodings that have been applied to the accompanying body data.

member.summary: Content-Encoding 標頭，指定已套用至隨附主體資料的編碼方式。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.ContentLanguage

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Language header, which specifies the natural language(s) of the accompanying body data.

member.summary: Content-Language 標頭，其指定隨附主體資料的自然語言。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.ContentLength

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Length header, which specifies the length, in bytes, of the accompanying body data.

member.summary: Content-Length 標頭，指定隨附主體資料的長度 (以位元組為單位)。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.ContentLocation

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Location header, which specifies a URI from which the accompanying body may be obtained.

member.summary: Content-Location 標頭，指定可以取得隨附主體的 URI。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.ContentMd5

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-MD5 header, which specifies the MD5 digest of the accompanying body data, for the purpose of providing an end-to-end message integrity check. Due to collision problems with MD5, Microsoft recommends a security model based on SHA256 or better.

member.summary: Content-MD5 標頭，指定隨附主體資料的 MD5 摘要，作為提供端對端訊息完整性檢查之用途。 由於 MD5 的衝突問題，Microsoft 建議您使用以 SHA256 或更好的加密方式為基礎的安全性模型。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.ContentRange

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Range header, which specifies where in the full body the accompanying partial body data should be applied.

member.summary: Content-Range 標頭，指定隨附的部分主體資料應套用在完整主體中的位置。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.ContentType

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Type header, which specifies the MIME type of the accompanying body data.

member.summary: Content-Type 標頭，指定隨附主體資料的 MIME 類型。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Cookie

summary.vsli:raw: The Cookie header, which specifies cookie data presented to the server.

member.summary: Cookie 標頭，指定提供給伺服器的 Cookie 資料。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Date

summary.vsli:raw: The Date header, which specifies the date and time at which the request originated.

member.summary: Date 標頭，指定起始要求的日期和時間。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Expect

summary.vsli:raw: The Expect header, which specifies particular server behaviors that are required by the client.

member.summary: Expect 標頭，指定用戶端所需的特定伺服器行為。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Expires

summary.vsli:raw: The Expires header, which specifies the date and time after which the accompanying body data should be considered stale.

member.summary: Expires 標頭，指定隨附主體資料應視為過時的日期和時間。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.From

summary.vsli:raw: The From header, which specifies an Internet Email address for the human user who controls the requesting user agent.

member.summary: From 標頭，為控制提出要求之使用者代理程式的人類使用者，指定網際網路電子郵件地址。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Host

summary.vsli:raw: The Host header, which specifies the host name and port number of the resource being requested.

member.summary: Host 標頭，指定所要求之資源的主機名稱和連接埠編號。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.IfMatch

summary.vsli:raw: The If-Match header, which specifies that the requested operation should be performed only if the client's cached copy of the indicated resource is current.

member.summary: If-Match 標頭，指定用戶端快取的指定資源複本為最新時，才應執行所要求的作業。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.IfModifiedSince

summary.vsli:raw: The If-Modified-Since header, which specifies that the requested operation should be performed only if the requested resource has been modified since the indicated data and time.

member.summary: If-Modified-Since 標頭，指定自指定日期和時間後所要求的資源已修改時，才應執行所要求的作業。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.IfNoneMatch

summary.vsli:raw: The If-None-Match header, which specifies that the requested operation should be performed only if none of client's cached copies of the indicated resources are current.

member.summary: If-None-Match 標頭，指定用戶端快取的指定資源複本都不是最新時，才應執行所要求的作業。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.IfRange

summary.vsli:raw: The If-Range header, which specifies that only the specified range of the requested resource should be sent, if the client's cached copy is current.

member.summary: If-Range 標頭，指定用戶端快取的資源為最新時，才應傳送所要求之資源的指定範圍。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.IfUnmodifiedSince

summary.vsli:raw: The If-Unmodified-Since header, which specifies that the requested operation should be performed only if the requested resource has not been modified since the indicated date and time.

member.summary: If-Unmodified-Since 標頭，指定自指定日期和時間後所要求的資源未修改時，才應執行所要求的作業。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.KeepAlive

summary.vsli:raw: The Keep-Alive header, which specifies a parameter used into order to maintain a persistent connection.

member.summary: Keep-Alive 標頭，指定維護持續性連線所使用的參數。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.LastModified

summary.vsli:raw: The Last-Modified header, which specifies the date and time at which the accompanying body data was last modified.

member.summary: Last-Modified 標頭，指定上次修改隨附主體資料的日期和時間。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.MaxForwards

summary.vsli:raw: The Max-Forwards header, which specifies an integer indicating the remaining number of times that this request may be forwarded.

member.summary: Max-Forwards 標頭，指定整數，指出這個要求可以轉寄的剩餘次數。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Pragma

summary.vsli:raw: The Pragma header, which specifies implementation-specific directives that might apply to any agent along the request/response chain.

member.summary: Pragma 標頭，指定可套用至要求/回應鏈結中任何代理程式的實作特定指示詞。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.ProxyAuthorization

summary.vsli:raw: The Proxy-Authorization header, which specifies the credentials that the client presents in order to authenticate itself to a proxy.

member.summary: Proxy-Authorization 標頭，指定用戶端出示的認證，以便向 Proxy 驗證自己。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Range

summary.vsli:raw: The Range header, which specifies the sub-range(s) of the response that the client requests be returned in lieu of the entire response.

member.summary: Range 標頭，指定用戶端要求傳回的回應子範圍，取代完整回應。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Referer

summary.vsli:raw: The Referer header, which specifies the URI of the resource from which the request URI was obtained.

member.summary: Referer 標頭，指定取得要求 URI 的資源 URI。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Te

summary.vsli:raw: The TE header, which specifies the transfer encodings that are acceptable for the response.

member.summary: TE 標頭，指定回應可接受的傳輸編碼方式。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Trailer

summary.vsli:raw: The Trailer header, which specifies the header fields present in the trailer of a message encoded with chunked transfer-coding.

member.summary: Trailer 標頭，指定以區塊傳輸編碼方式編碼之訊息結尾中出現的標頭欄位。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.TransferEncoding

summary.vsli:raw: The Transfer-Encoding header, which specifies what (if any) type of transformation that has been applied to the message body.

member.summary: Transfer-Encoding 標頭，指定已套用至訊息主題的轉換類型 (如果有的話)。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Translate

summary.vsli:raw: The Translate header, a Microsoft extension to the HTTP specification used in conjunction with WebDAV functionality.

member.summary: Translate 標頭，Microsoft 對 HTTP 規格的擴充功能，與 WebDAV 功能搭配使用。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Upgrade

summary.vsli:raw: The Upgrade header, which specifies additional communications protocols that the client supports.

member.summary: Upgrade 標頭，指定用戶端支援的其他通訊協定。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.UserAgent

summary.vsli:raw: The User-Agent header, which specifies information about the client agent.

member.summary: User-Agent 標頭，指定用戶端代理程式的資訊。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Via

summary.vsli:raw: The Via header, which specifies intermediate protocols to be used by gateway and proxy agents.

member.summary: Via 標頭，指定閘道和 Proxy 代理程式使用的中繼通訊協定。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader.Warning

summary.vsli:raw: The Warning header, which specifies additional information about that status or transformation of a message that might not be reflected in the message.

member.summary: Warning 標頭，指定訊息中未反映之訊息狀態或轉換的其他資訊。

member.name: T:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader

summary.vsli:raw: The HTTP headers that can be specified in a server response.

member.summary: 伺服器回應中可指定的 HTTP 標頭。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.AcceptRanges

summary.vsli:raw: The Accept-Ranges header, which specifies the range that is accepted by the server.

member.summary: Accept-Ranges 標頭，指定伺服器接受的範圍。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Age

summary.vsli:raw: The Age header, which specifies the time, in seconds, since the response was generated by the originating server.

member.summary: Age 標頭，指定自起始伺服器產生回應之後的時間 (以秒為單位)。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Allow

summary.vsli:raw: The Allow header, which specifies the set of HTTP methods that are supported.

member.summary: Allow 標頭，指定支援的 HTTP 方法集合。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.CacheControl

summary.vsli:raw: The Cache-Control header, which specifies caching directives that must be obeyed by all caching mechanisms along the request/response chain.

member.summary: Cache-Control 標頭，指定在要求/回應鏈結中，所有快取機制都必須遵守的快取指示詞。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Connection

summary.vsli:raw: The Connection header, which specifies options that are desired for a particular connection.

member.summary: Connection 標頭，指定用於特定連線的理想選項。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ContentEncoding

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Encoding header, which specifies the encodings that have been applied to the accompanying body data.

member.summary: Content-Encoding 標頭，指定已套用至隨附主體資料的編碼方式。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ContentLanguage

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Language header, which specifies the natural language or languages of the accompanying body data.

member.summary: Content-Language 標頭，指定自然語言或隨附主體資料的語言。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ContentLength

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Length header, which specifies the length, in bytes, of the accompanying body data.

member.summary: Content-Length 標頭，指定隨附主體資料的長度 (以位元組為單位)。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ContentLocation

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Location header, which specifies a URI from which the accompanying body can be obtained.

member.summary: Content-Location 標頭，指定可以取得隨附主體的 URI。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ContentMd5

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-MD5 header, which specifies the MD5 digest of the accompanying body data, for the purpose of providing an end-to-end message integrity check. Due to collision problems with MD5, Microsoft recommends a security model based on SHA256 or better.

member.summary: Content-MD5 標頭，指定隨附主體資料的 MD5 摘要，作為提供端對端訊息完整性檢查之用途。 由於 MD5 的衝突問題，Microsoft 建議您使用以 SHA256 或更好的加密方式為基礎的安全性模型。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ContentRange

summary.vsli:raw: The Range header, which specifies the subrange or subranges of the response that the client requests be returned in lieu of the entire response.

member.summary: Range 標頭，指定用戶端要求傳回的回應子範圍，取代完整回應。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ContentType

summary.vsli:raw: The Content-Type header, which specifies the MIME type of the accompanying body data.

member.summary: Content-Type 標頭，指定隨附主體資料的 MIME 類型。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Date

summary.vsli:raw: The Date header, which specifies the date and time at which the response originated.

member.summary: Date 標頭，指定起始回應的日期和時間。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ETag

summary.vsli:raw: The Etag header, which specifies the current value for the requested variant.

member.summary: Etag 標頭，指定要求之變數的目前值。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Expires

summary.vsli:raw: The Expires header, which specifies the date and time after which the accompanying body data should be considered stale.

member.summary: Expires 標頭，指定隨附主體資料應視為過時的日期和時間。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.KeepAlive

summary.vsli:raw: The Keep-Alive header, which specifies a parameter to be used to maintain a persistent connection.

member.summary: Keep-Alive 標頭，指定維護持續性 (Persistent) 連接所使用的參數。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.LastModified

summary.vsli:raw: The Last-Modified header, which specifies the date and time at which the accompanying body data was last modified.

member.summary: Last-Modified 標頭，指定上次修改隨附主體資料的日期和時間。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Location

summary.vsli:raw: The Location header, which specifies a URI to which the client is redirected to obtain the requested resource.

member.summary: Location 標頭，指定重新導向用戶端以取得所要求之資源的 URI。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Pragma

summary.vsli:raw: The Pragma header, which specifies implementation-specific directives that might apply to any agent along the request/response chain.

member.summary: Pragma 標頭，指定可套用至要求/回應鏈結中任何代理程式的實作特定指示詞。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ProxyAuthenticate

summary.vsli:raw: The Proxy-Authenticate header, which specifies that the client must authenticate itself to a proxy.

member.summary: Proxy-Authenticate 標頭，指定用戶端必須向 Proxy 驗證自身。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.RetryAfter

summary.vsli:raw: The Retry-After header, which specifies a time (in seconds), or a date and time, after which the client can retry its request.

member.summary: Retry-After 標頭，指定用戶端可以重試其要求的時間 (以秒為單位) 或日期和時間。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Server

summary.vsli:raw: The Server header, which specifies information about the originating server agent.

member.summary: Server 標頭，指定起始伺服器代理程式的資訊。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.SetCookie

summary.vsli:raw: The Set-Cookie header, which specifies cookie data that is presented to the client.

member.summary: Set-Cookie 標頭，指定提供給用戶端的 Cookie 資料。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Trailer

summary.vsli:raw: The Trailer header, which specifies that the indicated header fields are present in the trailer of a message that is encoded with chunked transfer-coding.

member.summary: Trailer 標頭，指定以區塊傳輸編碼方式編碼之訊息結尾中出現的特定標頭欄位。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.TransferEncoding

summary.vsli:raw: The Transfer-Encoding header, which specifies what (if any) type of transformation has been applied to the message body.

member.summary: Transfer-Encoding 標頭，指定已套用至訊息主體的轉換類型 (如果有的話)。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Upgrade

summary.vsli:raw: The Upgrade header, which specifies additional communications protocols that the client supports.

member.summary: Upgrade 標頭，指定用戶端支援的其他通訊協定。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Vary

summary.vsli:raw: The Vary header, which specifies the request headers that are used to determine whether a cached response is fresh.

member.summary: Vary 標頭，指定用來判斷快取回應是否最新的要求標頭。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Via

summary.vsli:raw: The Via header, which specifies intermediate protocols to be used by gateway and proxy agents.

member.summary: Via 標頭，指定閘道和 Proxy 代理程式使用的中繼通訊協定。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.Warning

summary.vsli:raw: The Warning header, which specifies additional information about that status or transformation of a message that might not be reflected in the message.

member.summary: Warning 標頭，指定訊息中未反映之訊息狀態或轉換的其他資訊。

member.name: F:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.WwwAuthenticate

summary.vsli:raw: The WWW-Authenticate header, which specifies that the client must authenticate itself to the server.

member.summary: WWW-Authenticate 標頭，指定用戶端必須向伺服器驗證自身。

member.name: T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection

summary.vsli:raw: Contains protocol headers associated with a request or response.

member.summary: 包含與要求或回應關聯的通訊協定 (Protocol) 標頭。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.#ctor

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> class.

member.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> class from the specified instances of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> classes.

member.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是來自 和 類別的指定執行個體。

param.name: serializationInfo
param.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> containing the information required to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" />.

member.param: ，含有要序列化 的必要資訊。

param.name: streamingContext
param.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> containing the source of the serialized stream associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" />.

member.param: ，含有與新 關聯之已序列化資料流的來源。

exception.vsli:raw: <paramref name="headerName" /> contains invalid characters.

member.exception: 包含無效的字元。

exception.vsli:raw: <paramref name="headerName" /> is a null reference or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

member.exception: 為 Null 參考或 。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.Add(System.Net.HttpRequestHeader,System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Inserts the specified header with the specified value into the collection.

member.summary: 將具有指定值的指定標頭插入至集合。

param.name: header
param.vsli:raw: The header to add to the collection.

param.name: value
param.vsli:raw: The content of the header.

exception.vsli:raw: .NET Framework and .NET Core versions 2.0 - 3.1 only: The length of <paramref name="value" /> is greater than 65535.

member.exception: 僅限 .NET Framework 與 .NET Core 2.0 - 3.1 版： 的長度大於 65535。

exception.vsli:raw: This <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> instance does not allow instances of <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpRequestHeader" />.

member.exception: 這個 執行個體不允許 的執行個體。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.Add(System.Net.HttpResponseHeader,System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Inserts the specified header with the specified value into the collection.

member.summary: 將具有指定值的指定標頭插入至集合。

param.name: header
param.vsli:raw: The header to add to the collection.

param.name: value
param.vsli:raw: The content of the header.

exception.vsli:raw: .NET Framework and .NET Core versions 2.0 - 3.1 only: The length of <paramref name="value" /> is greater than 65535.

member.exception: 僅限 .NET Framework 與 .NET Core 2.0 - 3.1 版： 的長度大於 65535。

exception.vsli:raw: This <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> instance does not allow instances of <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader" />.

member.exception: 這個 執行個體不允許 的執行個體。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.Add(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Inserts the specified header into the collection.

member.summary: 將指定標頭插入至集合。

param.name: header
param.vsli:raw: The header to add, with the name and value separated by a colon.

member.param: 要加入的標頭，具有以冒號分隔的名稱和值。

exception.vsli:raw: <paramref name="header" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

member.exception: 是 或 。

exception.vsli:raw:
<paramref name="header" /> does not contain a colon (:) character.
The length of <paramref name="value" /> is greater than 65535.
-or-
The name part of <paramref name="header" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> or contains invalid characters.
-or-
<paramref name="header" /> is a restricted header that should be set with a property.
-or-
The value part of <paramref name="header" /> contains invalid characters.

member.exception:

的長度大於 65535。

summary.vsli:raw: Inserts a header with the specified name and value into the collection.

<paramref name="headerValue" /> contains invalid characters.
